snippet.title: Monaco: What's Yours Is Mine OFFICIAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
Buy the Perfect Heist game at http://www.monacoismine.com

Assemble a crack team of thieves on Steam or XBLA and execute the perfect crime. Sneak, steal, and run for your lives in single player or with up to four friends in local or online co-op. Find out why it won the 2010 IGF Grand Prize and has been described by Rev3Games' Anthony Carboni as "one of the most fun co-op experiences I've ever played."

The Gentleman played by Alain Cadieux, trailer by Kert Gartner http://www.kertgartner.com

Monaco: What's Yours Is Mine available on XBLA and Steam on April 24, 2013! http://store.steampowered.com/app/113020
